review: My Note 3 would not screen mirror at all (and yes I did reset my phone). My Tab 3 would screen mirror with no issues.  There is no USB media player capability meaning you can't simply stick a USB flash drive in it expecting to view photos or home videos. It is super fast but too many restrictions for you to view free stuff (unless you like watching trailers or youtube videos). Almost everything costs money and you aren't getting any more of my money. If you are looking for a HD media device that has lots of restrictions this is a good unit. If you want the freedom of a dedicated media player get something like a Micca Spec. If this unit could play from the USB port and screen mirror with no issues it would be perfect. Those were the two main reasons why I had purchased this to begin with.
